args: *cough* Urgh... Another flop? I was sure\nI was going to open a wormhole that time.
Were my calculations off? Maybe I\nshould re-evaluate the experimental\nprocedures...?
Honestly, Sinoa, is there NOTHING you can\ndo to avoid those explosions?
Every time you blow something up it sends\ntremors through the castle—and more\nimportantly, my abacus!
I'm sorry about that, truly I am. But I'm on\nthe verge of a breakthrough! Please, allow\nme one more test!

Space-time physics magic is indisputably
sound. ...At least, on a theoretical level.
Anyway, I just know my next attempt will
be successful!
Something tells me you've been saying\nthat about the last fifty attempts...
Actually, would you mind if I took a look at\nyour research thus far?
Sure, it's right here. It's pretty complex\nstuff, though, so I doubt you'll be able\nto parse it at a glance.
Hmm... Yes, I'm afraid you're right.\nThese pages are teeming with symbols\nand diagrams unlike any I've ever seen.
The equations are no trouble, mind.\nFor example, this one here... Wait, \nyou've made a miscalculation!
Say WHAT?! There's no way I... Well, look\nat that. Guess that's what I get for skipping\nsleep before writing that part! Heh heh...
It's not just there. You have made minute\nerrors all over the place!
And the calculations are complete! THIS\nis the correct answer.

Jeez, you're a real whiz with that thing!
Thanks for the assist. Now that all the
numbers check out, I'm sure my next
attempt will bear wormhole-shaped fruit!
I just need to adjust the control valve to\nobtain the correct mana density based on\nyour calculations, and...
So that's your aim, is it?\nTo open a wormhole?
Nothing less! I'm on the verge of history—\nand you're about to have a front-row seat.
If you succeed, we'll be the first to witness\nan as-yet unseen phenomena...
Pretty exciting, huh? Well, let's get to\nit! Activating the space-time distortion\napparatus!
Internal mana density has reached target\nvalue! If I can just maintain this—
*cough* *cough* Not again... Where did I\ngo wrong...?

It would seem the issue runs deeper than a
few mistaken calculations. We must revisit
everything: the theory, the procedures,
all of it!
Um, sorry. Did you just say ＂we＂?
I can't very well return to my ledgers\nknowing your explosions will only\ncontinue to undo my work, can I?
Gaps in theory, errors in calculations,\nflaws in the apparatus; no deviation\nshall escape my discerning eyes.
I promise you this: with my capacity for\nanalytical thinking, this experiment WILL\nbe a success!
It's... It's perfect! Every aspect,\nfrom beginning to end!
By combining your theoretical framework\nwith my unparalleled calculatory ability,\nthe probability of success is now 100%!
A bold claim. Let's see how it holds up!\nActivating the space-time distortion\napparatus!
The theory, the calculations, the\napparatus... Everything was perfect!
Eeek! What's going on?!\n...Oh, it's one of Sinoa's experiments.
This place sure is a mess. Good thing I'm\nhere to clean up!
(Oh no, not her... She's chaos personified!)
(This experiment has absolutely zero\nmargin for error, and there's certainly\nno room for a random variable like her!)
Th-thanks, Melody, but we'll clean\nup right after—
First I'll start with tidying up the\nfloor and— Uwagh!
Er, guys? Why's this thing making so much\nnoise all of a sudden?
It will explode if we don't shut it down!\nHurry!
Leave it to me! ...But also please tell me\nhow!
See that lever right in front of you?\nPULL IT RIGHT NOW!
Not THAT lever, the one right next to it!\nThe activation lever!
Agh, no! That controls the magical\nfluid volume!
Does that mean it's gonna explode?!
There WAS no boom! No wormhole either,\nfor that matter, but not exploding is a huge\nstep forward!
The only question is, how do we recreate\nit? Maybe if we let Melody fiddle with\nthe controls again...
No! You cannot rely on chance alone!
I hear you, Xiao Lei, but we've already\ntried everything you and I can think of.
And since we still came up short, I think\nwe have to take a risk on chance.
I see... You mean to tap into the realm of\npossibility created by Melody's random\nactions, then?

I suppose it has been said that at a certain
point all one can do is let nature take its
course. So... We shall wager our fortunes
on Melody!
Oh, I'm nothing BUT serious when it\ncomes to my experiments. Will you\nhelp us, Melody?
Of course! I mean, I don't really know\nwhat's gonna happen, but... Hyah!
*gasp* I'm reading unprecedented levels\nof mana! This might just be enough to\nopen a wormhole!
W-we thoughtlessly increased the volume\nof mana, which naturally increased the\nexplosive power...
I-I didn't miss the boom that time...
I suppose...you can't hinge an\nexperiment on chance, after all...
